# openPBR_material — Property Reference
# Open PBR Surface material (MaterialX-based, industry standard).
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties
# Map slots use _map suffix. Toggle maps with _map_on (boolean).

## Base
base_weight : float                     # base layer weight 0.0-1.0
base_color : color                      # (color R G B)
base_color_map : texturemap
base_metalness : float                  # 0.0 = dielectric, 1.0 = metal
base_diffuse_roughness : float          # Oren-Nayar roughness

## Specular
specular_weight : float                 # 0.0-1.0
specular_color : color
specular_roughness : float              # 0.0 = mirror
specular_roughness_anisotropy : float
specular_ior : float                    # index of refraction

## Transmission (glass/liquid)
transmission_weight : float             # 0.0 = opaque, 1.0 = glass
transmission_color : color
transmission_depth : float
transmission_scatter : color
transmission_scatter_anisotropy : float
transmission_dispersion_scale : float
transmission_dispersion_abbe_number : float

## Subsurface
subsurface_weight : float               # 0.0-1.0
subsurface_color : color
subsurface_radius : float
subsurface_radius_scale : color         # per-channel radius
subsurface_scatter_anisotropy : float

## Coat
coat_weight : float                     # 0.0-1.0
coat_color : color
coat_roughness : float
coat_roughness_anisotropy : float
coat_ior : float
coat_darkening : float                  # energy loss under coat

## Fuzz (velvet/fabric)
fuzz_weight : float                     # 0.0-1.0
fuzz_color : color
fuzz_roughness : float

## Emission
emission_weight : float                 # 0.0-1.0
emission_color : color
emission_luminance : float              # cd/m²

## Thin Film
thin_film_weight : float                # 0.0-1.0
thin_film_thickness : float             # nm, ~300-700 for iridescence
thin_film_ior : float

## Geometry
geometry_thin_walled : boolean

## Normal / Bump / Displacement
bump_map : texturemap                   # bump map
bump_map_amt : float                    # bump strength
coat_bump_map : texturemap              # separate coat bump
coat_bump_map_amt : float
displacement_map : texturemap
displacement_map_amt : float
geometry_normal_map : texturemap        # normal map
geometry_tangent_map : texturemap       # tangent map
geometry_coat_normal_map : texturemap   # coat normal
geometry_coat_tangent_map : texturemap  # coat tangent
geometry_opacity_map : texturemap       # opacity/cutout map

## Map Slots (all have _map and _map_on variants)
# Every parameter above has a corresponding:
#   {param}_map : texturemap      — texture slot
#   {param}_map_on : boolean      — enable/disable map
